topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Operating System Kernels :: Linux

name: HostDetails
short_description: HostDetails is a script which can fetch the sensitive and important information related to the Linux server / client. This helps you to identify the Host-uptime details, User details, CPU details, Memory details, Hard-disk details, Task-processes details and network-related details. Currently available only for *nix environment.
summary: The collection of all important commands in a single script (LINUX)
